channel.title: Help us know who talks the most- make the game more interesting
channel.description:
I think the game lack the deduction part. It's really annoy me that one of the best unseen/cult tactic is just being quiet.
But also, I don't think its realistic to keep track on who talked the most of 16 players.
I suggest that you'll keep a counter for each player that show's the number of chars that he used on chat. I think this should make the game more about talking.
